name: Streamer Girl Simulator
description:
Streamer Girl Simulator is a fun and exciting simulation game where players can create their own streaming career for their custom streamer girl character. The character's appearance can be customized, from her eye, skin, and hair color to her clothes.



As the character progresses in the game, she can unlock different special streams, such as Dance, Yoga, and Pool streams.

The Pool stream is a fun event where players can perform various moves in the pool and give their followers a little show. This is a great way to cool off during the summer months and have fun with their followers.



In the Dance stream, players can dance energetically with a themed background and keep up with the rhythm of different songs. They can improve their dance performance to win the hearts of their followers.



In the Yoga stream, players can showcase their yoga skills and offer tips on meditation and body exercises. This is a great way to help their audience relax and gain a strong body structure.



At the beginning of the game, players can start with "Just Chatting" streams, where they can directly communicate with their followers and get to know them better. This type of stream doesn't require any specific activity, so players can simply chat and interact with their audience.



As players progress through the game, they can gain more followers and subscribers, increasing their level and becoming more popular. With each stream, players can improve their skills and interact with their followers, creating a unique and exciting streaming career.
